description: A regional leader in northern Italy says bear numbers are out of control but wildlife groups protest.
title: Italy bear faces cull after attack on father and son
title_page: Italy bear faces cull after attack on father and son - BBC News
maintext: "He lunged at my son... at that point I went after him to defend Christian. He bit my leg, then my arm, then my other hand. Then he left, miraculously. He could have killed us both."
